sentence.idiomatic: These are all things he gave me.
Everyone is outside waiting for you.
He spent all of his money.
This compressing software is really useful.
If you compress the files it will save a lot of space.
Can you condense the dialogue a little to make it shorter?
He went to Shanghai to replenish his stock.
Sorry, it's sold out. We will replenish the stock tomorrow.
We get our stock directly from the factory, so it's very cheap.
She chose the most expensive piece of clothing.
You're smaller than me, you go ahead and choose first.
This is a supermarket--whatever you want to eat, just choose yourself.
All of his property was confiscated.
He drove while under the influence of alcohol. The police confiscated his driver's license.
I was playing with toys in class, so the teacher confiscated my toy.
Yesterday you didn't come, I thought you were sick.
I thought you had left--when in actuality you were still there waiting for me.
Don't mistakenly think that because you're bigger than me, I'm afraid of you.
We've already broken up, why on earth are you still coming looking for me?
This is selling so well, why the heck aren't you stocking more of it?
If you're not angry, then what are you ignoring me for?
What new DVDs have you gotten in recently?
These are all new ones. Hollywood, Hong Kong, Korean, local ones--I've got them all. What do you like to watch?
Anything is fine. Which ones do you sell a lot of?
These few here are all pretty good. They all have big movie stars in them.
How about the quality?
They're definitely clear. Didn't you see what kind of goods these are? They are all DVD nines.
Oh. You also have a lot of television series here. Are they the compressed versions?
Yeah. They are all the latest seasons.
You have more DVDs than other people do, plus they're all pretty new. Where do you get your stock from?
Huh? Um... er... Hey, do you want to buy it or not?
Don't rush me, let me take my time and look. What are those? Give them to me to have a look at.
They're all the same. None of them are any good.

If I want you to bring them over, just bring them over. Be careful or I'll go report you to the police, and they'll confiscate all your DVDs. Don't think I don't know that what you're selling is all pirated.
What a joke! Everyone is selling the same thing, as if they would just arrest me.
Oh, you think?
Hey, brother... don't, don't, don't... by all means, don't. Whatever you want, I'll give them to you.
That's more like it.
